name: Medieval Pathfinder
description:
Allow us to introduce a bundle that includes two atmospheric RPGs:

Medieval Dynasty is a survival action RPG with a Medieval setting. Build and hunt, improve your diplomacy skills to lead your people, find love, and continue your lineage in Medieval Dynasty. You will have to survive in the harsh but beautiful Middle Ages. Every decision you make in the beginning determines your path to becoming the leader of a prosperous city. Play alone or with friends — the game has a co-op option.
Build your dynasty!

Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous is a hardcore RPG for fans of epic fantasy. Create your perfect character to explore and conquer the Worldwound — a huge number of classes and development paths await in Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous. Work your way up from an unknown traveler to the commander of armies and cities, and then, perhaps, to god or devil — only you will decide how your adventure turns out. Defeat demons and dragons, unravel this world's mysteries, and meet charismatic companions along the way.
Stop the evil flourishing on Golarion — or join it!

Hurry up to get this bundle at a bargain price and embark on exciting new adventures!

System requirements, bonus goodies, and features may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
